org.spdx.spdxspreadsheet

Class AbstractSpreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spdx.spdxspreadsheet.AbstractSpreadsheet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiDocumentSpreadsheet, SPDXLicenseSpreadsheet, SPDXSpreadsheet

    public abstract class AbstractSpreadsheet
extends Object
    Abstract class for implementing file based spreadsheets.
    Author:
    Gary OpNeall
